name: Everlasting Souls
description:
Everlasting Souls was conceptualized as a rogue-lite medieval fantasy brawler.

However, this idea was too ambitious to be completed as my first game. So, I watered it down to a proof-of-concept version.

The current version - 1.0 beta - features the first two areas of the game:

  1. Ephemeral Woods - a small 'tutorial' area
  2. Zandalor Dungeon - real enemies and a Boss Battle
